attributes.action: Help Fund The Air Ambulance With Government Funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The air ambulance as you are probably aware(or not)is funded totally by donations & charity events.
It is now time for the government to realise that this service needs full backing from No.10. The service they provide is second to none saving thousands of lives a year.Without this service & the hard work of all those involved then members of our families,friends & children could & would probably die.We need to recognise the service as an important part of the emergency services & petition this so called caring government to spend some of the money on a very worthwhile cause,a cause that the uk public fully backs & has had a say in where there tax money is spent.
Please sign this petition if you feel as strongly as i do.Hopefully you will never need the assistance of the air ambulance but as with anything in this life, You Never Know...  Thankyou
